task_description: Facing the building to your South (approx. 169°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: To view the upper portion of the target building and eventually see its full height, I need to rotate the camera upward, so I'll set the pitch to 30 degrees while keeping the current heading.
I'm currently facing North (0°), but the target building is to the South (~169°), so I need to rotate right by 170 degrees to re-align with the target building.
I can only see the lower portion of the target building, so I need to rotate the camera upward (pitch 30°) to view the upper part and the roof, which is necessary to estimate the full height.
I'm currently facing North (0°), so I need to rotate right by 170 degrees to face the target building located to the South (approx. 169°).
To view the upper section and roof of the target building, I need to rotate the camera upward by 30 degrees while maintaining my current heading toward the South-facing building.
I'm currently facing North (0°), so I need to rotate right by 170 degrees to align with the target building located at approximately 169° South.

I need to view the upper portion of the target building to estimate its full height, so I will rotate the camera upward by 30 degrees while maintaining my current heading toward the South-facing building.
To face the target South-facing building (170° heading) and view its upper portion, I will rotate right by 170 degrees to correct the heading while maintaining the 30° upward pitch.
I need to view the upper portion of the target South-facing building to estimate its full height, so I will rotate the camera upward by 30 degrees while maintaining my current heading.
From current heading 0°N and pitch30°UP, I need to rotate right 170 degrees (relative delta) to face the target 170°S building while maintaining the upward pitch to view its upper portion.
I can now see the full target building, which appears to be a 5-story structure with each floor roughly 3 meters tall, so the estimated total height is 15 meters.
